entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - transforms/SEC

[info] Activation of package dqc_15_concepts.csv, dqc_0011.csv, dqc_0079.csv, dqc_0080.csv, dqc_0081.csv, dqc_0091_ifrs_2018_concepts.csv, dqc_0091_ifrs_2019_concepts.csv, dqc_0094.csv and effective_dates.csv successful. - C:\Users\David\AppData\Local\Temp\tmpv95k_x7p\packages\resources.zip

[DQC.US.0109.9567] The concept us-gaap:ConcentrationRiskPercentage1 with value 0.22 should always be used with both the ConcentrationRiskByTypeAxis and the ConcentrationRiskByBenchmarkAxis. This element has no meaning without both these axis at a minimum. This fact only contains the numerator of ConcentrationRiskByTypeAxis, and not the member used on the ConcentrationRiskByBenchmarkAxis which represents the benchmark denominator. If this value represents the Concentration Risk, Threshold Percentage then use the extension element ConcentrationRiskThresholdPercentage.
The properties of this us-gaap:ConcentrationRiskPercentage1 fact are:
Period :2019-06-01 to 2020-05-31 Dimensions : us-gaap:AccountsNotesLoansAndFinancingReceivableByReceivableTypeAxis=nru:LoansReceivableCommercialAndIndustrialMember, us-gaap:ConcentrationRiskByTypeAxis=us-gaap:CustomerConcentrationRiskMember Unit : pure
Rule Element Id:9567 Rule version: 15.0.0RC5 - https://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/70502/000007050221000009/nru-20201130.htm 4
